price: Yeroo obboleessi isaanii Nuuh jedheen: “Sila Rabbiin hin sodaattanii.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum nūḥun alā tattaqūna
